hadiths.text: Al-Bara said:"When we performed Salat behind Allah's Messenger, he would raise his head from bowing, and no man among us would bend his back until Allah's Messenger prostrated, then we prostrated

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي كَرَاهِيَةِ أَنْ يُبَادَرَ الإِمَامُ بِالرُّكُوعِ وَالسُّجُودِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Dislike For Bowing And Prostrating Before The Imam
